titleStmt.title: Some reflections on a late pamphlet entituled, A vindication of Their Majesties authority to fill the sees of the deprived bishops, &c in a letter from the city to a friend in the country.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Thomas, 1654?-1741.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Browne, B.D., Fellow of St. Johns College, Cambridge. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
